2fe06110-fb1a-43eb-8f06-02b587985b34.description: Certified Revenue Cycle Representative (CRCR) badge earners help set the standards of performance for revenue cycle staff proving a high level of revenue knowledge and expertise has been reached. Individuals will be better prepared to increase receivables, reduce denials, and work more efficiently in the revenue cycle role.
2fe06110-fb1a-43eb-8f06-02b587985b34.name: Certified Revenue Cycle Representative (CRCR)

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the CRCR online study materials
Successfully complete the end of program assessment

Recommended for, but not limited to: revenue cycle staff and relevant operations: patient access, financial reps, patient accounts, HIM, case management, compliance, managed care operations, and decision support.

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 1 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

33e8c714-b897-405a-b2a7-6e94e6a091e6.description: Certified Healthcare Financial Professionals are healthcare leaders and professionals who have demonstrated a deep understanding of knowledge in healthcare financial management, new financial realities within healthcare. Individuals earning this credential will have a broad range of business and financial skills essential for succeeding in today’s high-value healthcare environment.
33e8c714-b897-405a-b2a7-6e94e6a091e6.name: Certified Healthcare Financial Professional (CHFP)

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the two-modular CHFP program:  Module I - HFMA Business of Health Care and Module 2 - Operational Excellence
HFMA Business of Health Care®
Operational Excellence
The CHFP is geared toward financial professionals, clinical, nonclinical and health plan leaders - all those whose jobs require a deep understanding of the financial realities of health care

ab0e5051-9121-4307-9654-e18ef95e78f5.description: Operational Excellence badge earners develop an understanding of how to address the dynamic healthcare business environment. Regardless of healthcare professional practice specialty, individuals will understand the new healthcare business dynamics and complex challenges related to the three stakeholder groups: payers, providers and physicians. Upon successful completion of the Operational Excellence (Module II of the CHFP program) assessment the CHFP certification badge is awarded.
ab0e5051-9121-4307-9654-e18ef95e78f5.name: Operational Excellence

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Operational Excellence assessment. The intent of this program is to exhibit mastery of the information learned in HFMA's Business of Health care, Module I of the CHFP program. NOTE: The CHFP is earned and awarded upon successful completion of two modules: HFMA Business of Health Care and Operational Excellence assessments.

Recommended healthcare industry experience in the following areas: Accounting, Business Development, Business Operations, Clinical Operations, Healthcare Economics, Operations Support, Pharmacy, Physician Practice.

d7cc4e6a-42e5-4146-aacf-81e0540025fe.description: Certified Specialist Business Intelligence badge earners have learned methods for reviewing data and using tools to ensure the right information is captured and used to make appropriate decisions. Individuals can utilize this business intelligence to help their organizations use data to: improve quality of care, increase financial efficiency, strengthen operational effectiveness, conduct innovative research, identify and manage risk, and establish strategic direction.
d7cc4e6a-42e5-4146-aacf-81e0540025fe.name: Certified Specialist Business Intelligence (CSBI)

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the program modules
Successfully complete the end of program assessment

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 1 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

a25d324c-46d2-49ab-9d03-c80f83c76815.description: Earning the HFMA Fellowship attests to one's financial expertise and leadership. Fellowship is awarded to HFMA members who have demonstrated financial expertise and leadership through the use of personal financial knowledge and skills in voluntary community service. HFMA Fellows act as ambassadors to the profession by raising the standard of practice through consistent participation in professional development activities and service to the healthcare finance industry.
a25d324c-46d2-49ab-9d03-c80f83c76815.name: Fellow of the Healthcare Financial Management Association (FHFMA)

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Fellow applicants are required to submit an online application meeting the following important requirements: current CHFP certification designation; five years total as a regular or advanced HFMA member; Bachelor degree or 120 semester hours from an accredited college or university and volunteer activity in healthcare finance within three years of applying for the FHFMA designation.

HFMA members who have earned Fellow of HFMA (FHFMA) designation must maintain their certification every three years by meeting two basic requirements: Remain an active HFMA member in good standing and complete 60 hours of eligible education activities. Learn more: www.hfma.org/maintain

19259560-d5e7-4b6a-a8be-13a1cdde7f3c.description: CSAF badge earners have knowledge of the healthcare accounting and finance competencies needed to address: financial reports and statements; overview of risk-sharing arrangements; managed care contracts and profitability ratios. The critical role of accounting and finance requires knowledge of these technical competencies that are used in decision support for all areas of healthcare management.
19259560-d5e7-4b6a-a8be-13a1cdde7f3c.name: Certified Specialist Accounting and Finance (CSAF)

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course modules
Successfully complete the end of course assessment

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 1 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

d56321ec-030c-47ad-af83-c2ba9e5d3626.description: Patient Access Essentials badge earners will gain an understanding of best-practice recommendations to enhance the knowledge, competencies, and productivity in patient-facing positions. Individuals will be better prepared and understand how their role impacts revenue cycle performance and reputation of the organization they represent overall.
d56321ec-030c-47ad-af83-c2ba9e5d3626.name: Patient Access Essentials

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Review four online courses
Complete a 75-question online assessment

cf6e2616-af51-46b9-a3ec-4383202c78c1.description: Certified Specialist Managed Care badge earners gain specialized knowledge to navigate payment models and rates, benefit coordination, reimbursement calculations, and cost-control incentives. Individuals will be better prepared to negotiate strategies, evaluate risks, address utilization and quality of care, and understand proposed payment models under healthcare reform.
cf6e2616-af51-46b9-a3ec-4383202c78c1.name: Certified Specialist Managed Care (CSMC)

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the program modules
Successfully complete the end of program assessement

546a885a-9555-4631-989b-aa3aa4a88016.description: Certified Specialist Physician Practice Management badge earners have demonstrated knowledge related to physician practice finance, cost accounting, revenue cycle, coding, reimbursement, and payer contracting acumen. The topics and techniques learned are central to the effective management of physician practices.
546a885a-9555-4631-989b-aa3aa4a88016.name: Certified Specialist Physician Practice Management (CSPPM)

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the online course modules
Successfully complete the end of program assessment

The intended audience for this course includes but may not be limited to accountants, financial analysts, and chief financial officers. The course is appropriate for those individuals with a minimum of two years of experience in healthcare at a manager level or above.

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 1 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

245ade26-34f9-4ddd-a1de-d5a8e31a78a7.description: Get recognized as a valued contributor to your organization's financial performance when you earn HFMA's Certified Specialist Payment & Reimbursement (CSPR) certification. Those who earn this certification have demonstrated specialist-level knowledge of the managed care environment, payment rates, benefit coordination, reimbursement models, cost-control incentives, legislative changes, and more.
245ade26-34f9-4ddd-a1de-d5a8e31a78a7.name: Certified Specialist Payment & Reimbursement (CSPR)

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the online course modules
Successfully Complete the end of program assessment

The recommended audience for this course should have knowledge of health care payment and reimbursement models, managed care environment, payment rates, benefit coordination and legislative changes. 1-2 years experience in payment, reimbursement or managed care setting.

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 1 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

486d2358-0254-480b-b01a-dfea5829748b.description: Individuals earning the Patient Financial Communications certificate have learned how to conduct critical financial conversations in various situations (e.g., newly insured patients, those with high deductible plans, uninsured patients). Certificate earners will be capable of communicating with patients about financial matters effectively, and with respect, in ways that enhance patient satisfaction.
486d2358-0254-480b-b01a-dfea5829748b.name: Patient Financial Communications

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Review the three learning modules
Successfully complete the end of program assessment

e1daff33-7bd3-48be-9fdc-d3e6028073bb.description: The HFMA Business of Health Care® badge earners attain an understanding of healthcare finance, risk mitigation, evolving payment models, healthcare accounting and cost analysis, strategic finance, and managing financial resources. Understanding the essential context of the business of health care and knowing why it works the way it does, and how it should work in the future, means you'll work more effectively toward the shared goal of health care today to improve patient health.
e1daff33-7bd3-48be-9fdc-d3e6028073bb.name: HFMA Business of Health Care®

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Business of Health Care online study materials
Successfully complete the end of program assessment

Recommended for those new to healthcare finance and healthcare finance professionals with one or more years experience in the industry - Accounting, Business Development, Business Operations, Healthcare Economics, Operations Support

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 3 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

c9469744-8a3f-4653-9eba-bc83dd0a9eee.description: The Certified Inpatient Coding Auditor certification validates and acknowledges the professional expertise of inpatient coding auditor professionals. HFMA's certified inpatient coding auditors will be able to identify key responsibilities in areas of under or over coding to avoid fraudulent coding and billing. Certified Inpatient Coding Auditors help organizations ensure coding accuracy, increase reimbursements, and improve overall revenue cycle performance.
c9469744-8a3f-4653-9eba-bc83dd0a9eee.name: Certified Inpatient Coding Auditor (CICA)

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the CICA assessment

The CICA certification assessment is recommended for coding professionals with at least 3 years of acute care inpatient coding experience. Participants should have a working knowledge of DRG assignment, case mix index, quality initiatives, MAC’s, RAC’s, and the importance of accurate clinical documentation. RHIA, RHIT, CCS, or CPC credential is recommended.

2b4acaa2-873b-4839-b2a0-340ca796e8d2.description: Get recognized as a valued contributor to your organization's revenue cycle performance when you earn the Certified Revenue Cycle Representative (CRCR) - GCC certification. The CRCR - GCC certification is an international program tailored for the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) that includes the countries of Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman and Qatar. CRCR - GCC earners can reach a high level of revenue cycle knowledge and expertise performance in the GCC countries.
2b4acaa2-873b-4839-b2a0-340ca796e8d2.name: Certified Revenue Cycle Representative (CRCR) - GCC

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the CRCR - GCC online study materials
Successfully complete the end of program CRCR - GCC assessment

Recommended for, but not limited to: revenue cycle staff and relevant operations: patient access, financial reps, patient accounts, HIM, case management, compliance, managed care operations, and decision support.

1fc3b8d2-c196-4c87-963d-48e17e5ccaa3.description: HFMA Business of Health Care® badge earners attain an understanding the essential context of the business of health care and knowing why it works the way it does, and how it should work in the future, means you'll work more effectively toward the shared goal of health care today to improve patient health. The course provides participants with an easy-to-understand way of the fundamentals of financial management in practice.
1fc3b8d2-c196-4c87-963d-48e17e5ccaa3.name: IHF-HFMA Business of Health Care®

issuer.summary: issued by Healthcare Financial Management Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Business of Health Care online study materials
Successfully complete the end of program assessment
